name: Goba Day
description:
Welcome to Goba Day, where you can become a Goba Farmer and help feed the people of Goba land during the drought.

As a skilled Goba Farmer, it is your duty to grow and harvest as many Gobas as possible. The Gobas are the only fruit that thrive during the drought, so it is up to you to ensure that the people of Goba land have enough to eat.

Every five years, it's Goba Day! Everybody loves Goba Day! Hopefully you have a Goba for everybody? DO YOU? Are you ready to Goba Goba and save the day?

Credits

Yän - Visuals, code, game system design

Jonas Tyroller- Audio, code, game system design
